WorkItem.Description:
When I try to write a value of 0 or 0.00 the cell content is actually not written. Excel shows the cell as empty.
 
This issue does not effect cell calculation, rather the average human reader treats this as an issue wondering if some sort of value got missed in the creation on the excel file.
 
This issue may be linked to bug 6348
WorkItem.Summary: If you write a 0 value in cell, cell shows as empty

Comments.Message: I forgot to add that this issue is presente in 1.6.0, 1.6.1 and 1.6.2
